      • createService

        protected abstract <I extends RemoteExternalSystemService<S>,C extends I> I createService(java.lang.Class<I> interfaceClass,
                                                                                          C impl)
                                                                                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                                          java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                          java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                                          java.rmi.RemoteException
        Generic method to retrieve exposed implementations of the target interface.

        Uses cached value if it's found; creates new and caches it otherwise.

        Type Parameters:
        I - service interface class
        C - service implementation
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - target service interface class
        impl - service implementation
        Returns:
        implementation of the target service
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - in case of incorrect assumptions about server class interface
        java.lang.InstantiationException - in case of incorrect assumptions about server class interface
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case of incorrect assumptions about server class interface
        java.rmi.RemoteException
